basics.name: Karel Mácha
basics.label: Professional Full Stack Web Developer
basics.summary:
German coming originally from Czech Republic. Professional Web Developer. Open-Source supporter and occasional contributor. Software architecture and DevOps enthusiast with a one good eye for pixel-perfect design.
  
  "Happy are those who dream dreams and are ready to pay the price to make them come true."  _Leon J. Suenes_

work.summary: Development of special communication platforms (_besondere elektronische Notarpostfach_/_besondere elektronische Anwaltspostfach_) for notary and lawyer offices in Germany.
highlights: Implementation of new features according to the customer specification.
Improvement and enhancement of the development and CI processes.
Bug fixes and optimization of the consisting code base in Front-End and Back-End.

work.summary: Development of REST-APIs and internal web applications
highlights: Concept and development of interactive editor and configuration-server for administration of operating areas.
Concept and development of driver-administration web application.
Concept and development of service-monitoring display.

work.summary: Maintenance and enhancement of HERE WeGo web application
highlights: Application maintenance, trouble shooting and issue resolution.
Improving monetization performance, SEO, user-base enhancement
Concept, design and development of the Front-End UI
Concept, and development of Back-End services and user-management
Concept and development of APIs for services computing betting predictions.

work.summary: Development of an nation-wide archival system for archeology and ancient studies.
highlights: Concept, and development of archival system.
Support at adoption of agile development methods.

work.summary: Enhancement of the health- network platform.
highlights: Support-management and maintenance of the health-network services.
On-site customer support.

work.summary: Development of a Linux- based, network-capable multi-camera-system.
highlights: Finalizing and optimization of multi-camera-system using unbuffered cameras.
Development of control software for remote controlling and management.

work.summary: Analysis and visualization of medical data.
highlights: Concept and development of interactive, web-based visualization for connected medical data
Development of XML data parser for analysis of medical thesaurus.

work.summary: Development and enhancement of web-based databases for structural
highlights: Enhancement and development of the database front-end.
Optimization and enhancement of underlying data sources.

work.company: Thüringer Universitäts– und Landes- bibliothek (university library)
work.summary: Development of software for image processing and digitization of book inventories.

courses: Agile project management according to SCRUM
__Bioinformatics__ - Algorithmic phylogenetics, Bioinformatic methods in genomics, Biosystemanalysis, Database systems, Molecular computing,  Evolutionary principles
__Biochemistry and Molecular Biology__ - Biological rhythms and molecular clocks, Photobiology, Modeling metabolic systems
__Informatics__ - Parallel algorithms, Digital electronics / Digital circuits
__Informatics and Mathematics__ - Image Processing / Computer Vision

education.institution: Gymnázium Na Pražačce (German and Czech high-school Prague)

publications.name: Supertarget goes quantitative: update on drug–target interactions
A novel method for achieving an optimal classification of the proteinogenic amino acids
publications.summary: Scientific publication based on my original research done as part of my diploma thesis.
